net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.maps.events
Class CharacterEvent

java.lang.Object
  net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.maps.MapObject
      net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.maps.events.MapEvent
          net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.maps.events.CharacterEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<MapObject>, Renderable, Positionable, PositionSetable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Block, Hero
public class CharacterEvent
extends MapEvent

A character event is an event with an MDO and an animation that looks kind of like a character.

CharacterEvent

public CharacterEvent(Level parent,
                      CharacterEventMDO mdo,
                      float x,
                      float y)
Creates a new char event with the specified data at the specified coords.

Parameters:
parent - The parent level of the event
mdo - The data to create the event with
x - The x-coord of the event (in pixels)
y - The y-coord of the event (in pixels)

startMove

public void startMove(Direction dir)
Start moving in a particular direction. Does not switch immediately to that direction but rather adds some speed in that direction based on hero walk rate.

Parameters:
dir - The direction to move in

stopMove

public void stopMove(Direction dir)
Stop moving in a particular direction. Does not switch immediately to that direction but rather adds some speed in that direction based on hero walk rate.

Parameters:
dir - The direction to cancel velocity in

addMoveComponent

protected void addMoveComponent(DirVector vector)
The character starts moving in the specified direction. Uses its built-in speed. (but right now it just takes it from the speed mdo)

Parameters:
vector - The vector direction to start moving in
